Sentencas: Ni infiltration into porous YSZ scaffolds is a promising route for the construction of high performing and redox-stable Ni-YSZ anodes for application in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of porous YSZ scaffold microstructure on the long-term performance of infiltrated Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: However, the long-term instability of this type of anode is a critical problem.
Titulo: Effect of porous YSZ scaffold microstructure on the long-term performance of infiltrated Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: Here, it is shown that an interconnected Ni film, rather than discrete Ni particles, can be formed inside a porous, pre-sintered YSZ scaffold by using a polymeric Ni-based precursor as the infiltration medium.
Titulo: Effect of porous YSZ scaffold microstructure on the long-term performance of infiltrated Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: To understand the effect of the YSZ microstructure on the long-term stability and the electrochemical performance of the resulting composites, two types of Ni-YSZ anodes were investigated.
Titulo: Effect of porous YSZ scaffold microstructure on the long-term performance of infiltrated Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: Anodes prepared by polymeric Ni infiltration into a YSZ Scaffold with large grains (0.5 mu m) and pores (0.5 mu m and 5 mu m) showed extensive agglomeration in the Ni phase, resulting in poor stability and poor activity.
Titulo: Effect of porous YSZ scaffold microstructure on the long-term performance of infiltrated Ni-YSZ anodes
